sub_title: Independent email marketing and eCRM consultant
summary:
Online marketing consultant with substantial experience. High premium on e-mailmarketing and marketing automation. Knows how to work with marketeers, C-suite and IT. 

Be sure to contact me at jvrijn@emailmonday.com

Specialties: Email marketing, 
Online marketing strategy,
Email and Marketing Automation Software selection,
Campaign Management,
Speaking and training.

Companies like Scania, KLM, Unilever, AEGON, CZ, FNV, NRC Media have asked me for advice.
